title: cheap prices, good food
text:
Great location, kind staff and small prices, but...

We eat 2 seafood dishes and one vegetable salad for two people, food was great but portions was small, and we stay hungry after that dinner) actually it's was first place in Greece with so small portions, day ago we ordered similar dishes in another place and we couldn't eat it because huge.

title: Nice place to visit
text: It's really interesting castle with nice views at the sea, town and not big mountains around. Territory is really huge and you can spend two or more hours here.

title: Good hotel
text:
Nice place to stay for it's price. Excellent staff and service. Clean rooms. Great location and views
Minuses: thin walls, you will hear everything from corridor and neighboring rooms.
Breakfasts made from cheapest products, so they are not delicious

title: Fantastic place
text:
It's real amazing gorge, with breathtaking views. We were here at February 2020, weather was about +9 C
Road from Kalabaka was long and hard a bit but it really worth it

title: Great place
text: Simple greek tavern with nice view, huge portions, kind staff and delicious food. Prices bit high, but it worth it)

title: Monumental historical place
text: In fact itâ€™s main attraction of Athens, ticket costs 10 euro for non EU, and it worth it. Huge territory and amazing view at city. Must visit.

title: Good for breakfast also
text: Nice place with a lot of sweets and bakery. But we had a breakfast here couple times. Delicious food and good prices

title: amazing white mount, must see
text: The greatest mount i've ever seen. Breathtaking views guaranteed) My wife don't like mountains at all, but she was impressed to Were here at September and it was little bit cold, also it this time of year summit often behind clouds and a big chance, that you could see it.

title: Most underrated place in Armenia
text:
I don't why but nobody talk about this amazing place... actually it's one of beautifulest places i've ever seen. I talk about canyon near monastery, cause monastery - nothing special, its another ancient building in this country)
This place located near Yerevan, and taxi is really very cheap (Yandex Taxi app)
I highly recommend this place
